definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: rod becomes ´[[נ]] Ex 4:3 (J), cf. Ex 7:15 (E); ´[[עֲלֵי חוּר דֶּרֶח נ]] Pr 30:19.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: ´[[נ]] (appar.) as hissing Je 46:22 (in sim., cf. Gie); as eating dust Is 65:25 cf. Mic 7:17 (in sim.; v. also Ge 3:14).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: as crafty tempter Ge 3:1, Ge 3:2, Ge 3:4, Ge 3:13, Ge 3:14.
